Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Agencija Square Collection ima u ponudi posebnu vilu u mirnom mjestu u blizini Splita. Sitno Gornje je udaljeno 20 minuta vožnje od Splita i Omiša. Splitsko zaleđe je idealna lokacija, manje od pola sata od gradske vreve i sadržaja, seoska idila i mir i pogled s kojeg se grad, more i  otoci prostiru kao na dlanu. Dodatno ova lokacija sugerira čistu prirodu i aktivnosti u njoj- planinarenje na planini Mosor, Zipline na liticama iznad rijeke Cetine, razna seoska gospodarstva u okolici, rafting na rijeci Cetini, te prirodne pješčane plaže kraj grada Omiša. Ima prostranu okućnicu 1000 m2 koja osigurava privatnost i mir. Prostire se na dvije etaže po 250 m2, sa šest spavaćih soba, pet kupaonica, 2 wc-a, te kuhinjom i blagovaonicom. Vila ima dvorište sa grijanim bazenom (12x5m), sunčalištem i sjenicom, te roštiljem.Ima parking za 6 vozila. PERSPEKTIVNO ULAGANJE: Vila osigurava ugodan miran život kao obiteljska kuća, i alternativno može služiti u svrhu turističkog iznajmljivanja te je kao takva unosna investicija sa već uhodanim sustavom rezervacija i velikom popunjenosti! Razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani Ugovor o posredovanju, a što je u skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti podataka i Zakonom o posredovanju i prometu nekretninama.Kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju. Za sve dodatne informacije, i razgled, ljubazno molimo zvati na +385 99 4000 602 (Katja). The Square Collection agency offers a special villa in a quiet place near Split. Sitno Gornje is a 20-minute drive from Split and Omiš. Split's hinterland is an ideal location, less than half an hour from the hustle and bustle of the city, rural idyll and peace and a view from which the city, the sea and the islands spread out like in the palm of your hand. In addition, this location suggests pure nature and activities in it - hiking on Mosor Mountain, Zipline on the cliffs above the Cetina River, various farms in the area, rafting on the Cetina River, and natural sandy beaches near the town of Omiš. It has a spacious garden of 1000 m2 that ensures privacy and peace.  It is spread over two floors of 250 m2 each, with six bedrooms, five bathrooms, two toilets, and a kitchen and dining room. The villa has a yard with a heated swimming pool (12x5m), sun deck and gazebo, and a barbecue.There is parking for 6 vehicles. PERSPECTIVE INVESTMENT: The villa ensures a comfortable and peaceful life as a family home, and alternatively it can serve as a tourist rental and as such is a profitable investment with an already well-established reservation system and high occupancy! Viewing the property is only possible with a signed Brokerage Agreement, which is in accordance with the Data Protection Act and the Act on Brokerage and Real Estate Transactions.The buyer pays the agency commission. For all additional information and a tour, please kindly call at +385 99 4000 602 (Katja).
